tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE ProjectTasks ( task_id INT, task_name VARCHAR(255), dependency_id INT, priority ENUM('High', 'Medium', 'Low') );

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    priority INT,
    due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    priority INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Dependencies (
    dependency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dependent_task_id INT,
    dependency_task_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (dependent_task_id) REFERENCES Tasks(task_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (dependency_task_id) REFERENCES Tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    priority INT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);
